text: @GOP @WhiteHouse That would be TOO little TOO late.... #DonTheCon left it to the governors to sort out. #COVID19 going strong in the USA.. Thanks to the DO NOTHING president.  The little man with NO PLAN. #RemoveTrumpNow #RidenWithBiden2020
